description: Supply and delivery of one Compact Yard Tractor
full_summary:
================:
### Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Number
WS4379803355

#### Publication Date
February 12, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date
February 22, 2024, 02:00:00 PM (Mountain Time)

#### Opportunity
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for the supply and delivery of one compact yard tractor to replace the current tractor at the Natural Resources Canada (NRCAN) office in Victoria, British Columbia.

#### Specifications
The compact yard tractor must meet the requirements outlined in the tender notice. Bidders are required to have experience in delivering similar equipment.

#### Selection Criteria
The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements
This opportunity is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Kenny Seeto at kenny.seeto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Tender Documents
The tender notice is available on SAP Ariba at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18773712. 

Note: The expanded phrase for corporation mandate reference acronym PA allows scalable leading practices.

Uh-oh I just realized I extracted too much information in the output passage (Mostly info from the last paragraph of the given output). This skips the English verion description. Here is the updated ( Trimming down info on the last, and  briefening right-size fills many passage options Xen entry:
